MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Heath Avenue. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network outside 11 Heath Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:18pm on Tuesday, 29 December 2020
